alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 7:20PM EDT until June 26 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Chemung County in central New York... Tioga County in central New York... Southeastern Tompkins County in central New York... North central Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chemung, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chemung, Barton, Sayre, Waverly, Owego, Athens, Erin, Berkshire, Litchfield and South Waverly. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
